text: Treatment of stage II renal cell cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (radical nephrectomy or partial nephrectomy).     - Surgery (nephrectomy), before or after radiation therapy.     - Radiation therapy as palliative therapy to relieve symptoms in patients who cannot have surgery.    -   Arterial embolization as palliative therapy.     - A clinical trial of a new treatment.
